packages.title: Popular Equipment Package for SE
details: Power driver seat with power lumbar support

packages.title: Ultimate Package for Limited
details: High Intensity Discharge (HID) headlights with Dynamic Bending Lighting System (DBLS)
Automatic Emergency Braking (AEB) with Pedestrian Detection

specs.name: Body material:Advanced High-strength steel and high tensile steel
Front suspension: Independent MacPherson strut with coil springs
4-wheel disc brakes with Anti-lock Braking System (ABS)
Motor-Driven Power Steering (MDPS) rack-and-pinion steering, column-mounted
Height (in.) without roof rack side rails/with roof rack side rails
Cargo volume (cu. ft.) rear seats up/rear seats folded down
Automatic Emergency Braking with Pedestrian Detection
Tire Pressure Monitoring System (TPMS) with individual tire pressure indicator
Advanced dual front airbags (SRS) with Occupant Classification System (OCS)
Front and rear roof-mounted side-curtain airbags (SRS) with rollover sensors
Front seatbelt pretensioners and force limiters
Rear LATCH (Lower Anchors and Tethers for CHildren)
Remote keyless entry system with alarm
Dual fold-away heated power bodycolor side mirrors
Front windshield wiper de-icer (Standard on AWD)
Proximity Key entry with push button start
Power windows with driver’s auto-up/down with pinch protection
8-way power driver seat with power adjustable lumbar support
Premium instrument panel and driver's side panel
Leather-wrapped steering wheel and shift knob
Smart phone/USB and auxiliary input jacks
AM/FM/SiriusXM/HD Radio/MP3 premium audio system with external amp and 8 Speakers
4.2-inch color trip computer with Electroluminescent Gauge Cluster
